knimeNode.name: Keras Add Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: A layer that adds two inputs.

fullDescription.intro: A layer that adds two inputs. Corresponds to the Add Keras layer . The inputs must be of the same shape.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network that is the first input of this Add layer.
The Keras deep learning network that is the first input of this Add layer.
ports.outPort: The two input Keras deep learning networks merged into one by the added Add layer.
